amendment.description: Amendment sought to generally prohibit the deregulation of cable rates for an existing cable system until a telephone company had actually been authorized to provide competing video services to subscribers in the same franchise area, limit the exemption from price controls, and lower the complaint threshold under which the FCC could trigger a rate review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 104-223, to generally prohibit the deregulation of cable rates for an existing cable system until a telephone company actually has been authorized to provide competing video services to subscribers in the same franchise area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 275 (Roll no. 628).
